overview: Featuring Level 42 frontman and bassist Mark King.  Recorded live at Ryde Theatre, Isle Of Wight, November 22nd 2000.  Track List: 1. Just Like That, 2. Changing The Guard, 3. Dream Crazy, 4. Love Wars, 5. True Believers, 6. Kansas City Milkman, 7. Keep Climbing, 8. Lying Still, 9. I Sleep On My Heart, 10. Take Care Of Yourself, 11. Running In The Family, 12. Lessons In Love, 13. Something About You, 14. The Chinese Way.
title: Mark King - Isle of Wight
